product.name: Revlon PhotoReady Kajal Matte Eye Pencil
product.description: NEW Revlon PhotoReady Kajal Matte Eye Pencil is a highly pigmented colour with matte finish that glides on effortlessly.Features:Use the built in smudger to take it from precise to smokySoft kajal can be used to line the inner rimAll day wearOphthalmologist tested
